Summary: Amber orange pulsating sphere shaped object went right over my house.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in San Angelo
There were 3 other sightings in San Angelo on or around October 10th 2010
divs: sighting detailson oct. 10, 2010 i was driving up to my driveway and happened to look up and saw this orange\ yellow pulsating sphere shaped object. at first i thought it was something for halloween, but it was not. i came right over my house and right over me. i was standing in the driveway as it passed over me, it made no sound whatsoever. it was not an airplane or helicopter. i don't know what it was, but i don't think it was from our world. the place this object was sighted is in west texas.
